info.name: CapAuth Passwordless Login
info.description:
Enable passwordless login to Nextcloud using CapAuth sovereign identity.
Instead of username and password, users authenticate by proving ownership of their PGP private key. No passwords stored. No PII on server. Zero-knowledge.
Requires a running CapAuth Verification Service (capauth-service).
Features: - Passwordless PGP challenge-response authentication - Zero PII stored server-side (fingerprint only) - Auto-enrollment for new keys - Admin approval mode for high-security deployments - OIDC-compatible claims from client-asserted profiles - Works with capauth CLI, browser extension, and QR mobile login
